summary: This document is an email exchange between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing a visit from Peter Mandelson to New York. The email emphasizes confidentiality and includes disclaimers regarding the information contained within.

keyFacts: The email discusses Peter Mandelson's visit to New York.
The communication is marked as confidential and may contain attorney-client privileged information.
Epstein emphasizes the unauthorized use or disclosure of the email is prohibited.
